page.title: 04LIFE AS A CHILD
page.content: AT TEN O'CLOCK ON A SUNDAY MORNING THERE'S SUNDAY SCHOOL IN ST. JOHNS .IT LASTS AN HOUR. THIRTYFOUR CHILDREN GO TO SUNDAY-SCHOOL, AGE 4_11 YEARS. ON MONDAY SCHOOL STARTS AT 9, IT STOPS FOR A QUARTER OF AN HOUR IN THE MORNING AND AN HOUR AT LUNCH.THERE IS NO BREAK IN THE AFTERNOON FOR THE JUNIORS BUT THERE IS ONE FOR THE INFANTS AGE 5-7 YEARS, TIME 9A.M.-3P.M.TUESDAY IS SCHOOL.SOMETIMES I GO TO THE PARK.WEDNESDAY AFTER SCHOOL IS BROWNIES WE PLAY LOTS OF GAMES (TIME FIVE O'CLOCK-SIX THIRTY P.M.) AGE 7-10 YEARS.ON THURSDAY AFTER SCHOOL I GO TO COUNTRY DANCING,AND NETBALL PRACTICE I AM A RESERVE.ON FRIDAY AFTER SCHOOL I GO TO SALISBURY SWIMMING POOL.I AM A STRONG SWIMMER.TIME FOUR O'CLOCK-FOUR THIRTY P.M.ON SATURDAY I DONT DO ANYTHING.
